attributes.review: when i originally got this app, i noticed that it drains my battery so quickly. soon enough more problems emerged. it started to make my phone freeze up and glitch a lot, then would randomly power it down. i’m not huge on conspiracies or anything but it seems like this may have been to download my data or install something on my phone without my permission? kind of concerned. anyway, DO NOT GET THIS APP
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: About a week ago I had this app on my other phone, as soon as I downloaded it .. my phone blacked out. I had no idea of what was going on so I went to get it fixed. The worker said my phone was in perfect condition so we had mirror my phone to my apple computer. Sooner or later we found out my phone had 40 different viruses on it, like I kid yall not. Do  not download this app I had to get a whole new phone.
attributes.title: Terrible app !

attributes.review: I downloaded this app hoping to get all of the inside scoop about the trump administration and how this campaign is going, however I was met with the opposite. This app immediately started spamming with notifications... but my notifications were off. Completely takes control of your phone, trump 2020 was sent to all of my contacts, and his face became my lockscreen without me changing it. highly disappointed:((
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: When I opened the app the whole screen started to be covered by a GINORMOUS orange. I thought it might have just been a picture of the big man himself but I was severely wrong. The whole app is filled with bugs that keep messing up my microwave which made my squirrel run away in fear. I am highly disgusted by the fact that there’s no pictures of glizzys on here. I highly expected them to be and they’re not. Overall terrible app. DONT RECOMMEND!!!!!!
attributes.title: ABOMINABLE APP!!!

attributes.review: This app was the worst app I ever downloaded. Immediately when I first opened the app, it was filled with cockroaches and the disgusting bugs that they need to clean up. Also THERE WERE RATS and let me tell u how much I hate rats! Absolutely disgusting, how dare our president put out such a disgraceful app. You would think that he could’ve payed some fancy person to make a five star quality app but NOOOO he had to be cheap and make an app infested with roaches. GOD, CALL AN EXTERMINATOR YOU CHEAPSKATE 🤦‍♀️
attributes.title: Disgusting

attributes.review:
As soon as I found this app I felt this very overwhelming sense of racism. Before it could ruin my life and my countries I threw my phone into a lake than took a swim myself washing away all the negativity this app and this president brought me. Unfortunately when I got out of the lake Trump was still president and this app still exists. Luckily I can help get rid of both by rating this app and voting for the 2020 election. 
Let’s do this Gen Z! Let’s change the world.
attributes.title: For gen Z

attributes.review: So I was obviously going to download the trump app because I’m a racist menace to society, as all are the other people who support trump are (hey dad, i’m talking to u) and afterwards my phone started glitching and then out of nowhere porn ads just started popping up on my phone. the next day i went on the trump app to see how the cheeto man was doing😆😆 then my phone just CAUGHT ON FIRE😱😱 I’m now dead and i am typing this review from hell. don’t download the app😠😠
attributes.title: This app ruined my life

attributes.review:
i got this app thinking it was helpful but NO!! it was not at all. i am very disappointed in mr. orange man OOPS I MEANT DONALD TRUMP anyways this apps dumb, stupid and a big meanie i HATE this app from the bottom of my toes to the stop of my scalp. attributes.review: Worst app in the history of apps, even worse than trying to get on the internet on your phone in airplane mode!! I opened it & my cat & lamp both sneezed on me & I didn’t know what to do so I called the vet & they told me to look in the fridge😡 so I open the fridge & my lawyer called & said the ceiling was gonna catch on fire if I didn’t check my calendar. & that’s when hitler told me to shut up so I parked my car in the garage & now he’s dead.
attributes.title: Terrible👁👄👁 APP SUXZ
